message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to deliver exceptional value. I believe it could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. For this unique opportunity, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $8500. I trust this price reflects the quality and benefits you will receive. Please let me know if you have any questions or would like to proceed.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality and value you're providing. However, my budget allows for a lower price. Would you consider selling the product for $7500?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of that, I am pleased to offer the product to you for $8000. This price reflects the value we place on finding the right buyer who will truly benefit from our product. I hope this revised offer meets within your budget parameters and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
